title: Attendance at Cineplex cinemas 2010 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Attendance in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 9.
Overall Attendance in millions has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Attendance in millions, about 77.0 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Attendance in millions about 66.1 was reached at Year 2011
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Attendance in millions, containing a total of 9 data points.
In general Attendance in millions has stayed the same over the Year.

Attendance in millions is roughly constant from 2010 to 2011, slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015, slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
